2-Game Panel Buttons
 L2 specifics are here: characters, pledges, cursed weapons and static events.
2-1 Players in your hand.
Manage: Common player related actions legacy panel.
List: Dialog with a list of online players, displays level, class and a search box. Click on a name for details.
Set Name: Quick permanent change on a player's name. Intended for rules enforcement, not for events.
Set Title: Quick permanent title change. Players can change it later if they're noble or part of a clan.
2-2 Clans: The center of a synthetic society.
Create: target character will become leader. Clan name must be provided in the quickbox.
Delete: divide and conquer. Instantly disband a clan by targetting its leader.
Set Level: Specify a level from 0 to 8. Target must be a clan leader.
Reputation: Specify positive or negative value to alter current reputation score. Target must be a clan leader.
Castles/CH: Castles, Sieges and Clan Halls management dialogs.
Info: Shows Pledge info window. Target must be a clan leader.
2-3 Cursed Weapons. Chaos a la carte.
Info: displays status information for all of the supported CWs.
Add: if your target is a character, will receive the specified weapon. Item id, item name or a part of it must be written in the QB (ex.: zariche)
Remove: takes a cursed weapon from the world. Item Id, item name or a part of it must be specified in the quickbox (ex: akamanah)
2-4 Seven Signs and the moving dwarves.
Blacksmith: Prints coordinates and takes you to it if it's spawning.
Merchant: Prints coordinates and takes you to it if it's spawning.
Respawn: Displays respawn ETA as a system message.
2-5 Olympiads: YAWIP.
Save Olympiad: Manually saves olympiad status.
Manual Hero: calculates winners, rewards new heros.
